ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that just the outside of the beast is organic, not the internal systems, no nerves, muscles, or biological internal organs. ... Cybertronians

I think that just the outside of the beast is organic, not the 
internal systems, no nerves, muscles, or biological internal organs.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ( I thought nerve gas attacked not only the brain, but the nervous 
> system?  Oh well, for the sake of argument, let's just not have it 
> affect bots.)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> > (No, nerve gas takes out the brain I believe, and the 
Cybertronians 
> have no 
> > organic brain, beast mode or otherwise)
> > 
> > << OOC:( Wouldn't nerve gas ahve an effect on the bio part of the 
> bot? 
> >  Not the techno part, but just the Bio part?) >>
